# The Sorting Hat - Project Summary

This is an ASP.NET Core 9.0 MVC web application for the Zazzo family to manage household chores with a Harry Potter theme.

## Features Implemented

âœ¨ **The Sorting Ceremony** - Magical UI for distributing chores monthly
ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§â€ğŸ‘¦ **Family Management** - CRUD operations for family members (Parents, Teens, Kids)

ğŸ“Š **Smart Distribution Algorithm** - Balances workload and avoids monthly repetition
ğŸ¨ **Harry Potter Theme** - Animated UI with magical effects

## Technical Stack

- ASP.NET Core 9.0 MVC
- Entity Framework Core with SQLite (dev) and Azure SQL (prod)
- Bootstrap 5 with custom magical styling
- SortingHatService for chore distribution logic

## Running the Project

```bash
dotnet run
```

Navigate to `https://localhost:5001`

## Deployment to Azure

See README.md for detailed Azure deployment instructions including:
- Azure SQL Database setup (free tier)
- Azure App Service deployment (F1 free tier)
- Connection string configuration

Total estimated cost: ~$5/month on Azure
